Headline: Pasig City to start vaccination of its private health professionals this week – Manila Bulletin
Text: COVID vaccination for private health professionals residing in Pasig City will start on Friday, March 26.Pasig City’s Public Information Office, in a Facebook post on Wednesday, called on private medical and dental clinics and private health practitioners to have themselves scheduled for vaccination.Inoculation will take place at the Pasig City Mega Parking 2 from March 26 (Friday) to March 29 (Monday), 8 a.m. to 4 p.m.“Private health professionals with updated Pasig Health Monitor and those who were contacted by the Pasig Vaccination Command Center will be prioritized,” the Pasig City PIO said.Private health professionals who wish to be included in the vaccination must follow these three steps:The city government, meanwhile, reminded residents who belong to other priority groups to wait for further announcements regarding their vaccination.“We are still in the process of vaccinating our healthcare workers who are the topmost priority for the Vaccination Program as set by the Department of Health,” the city PIO said.
